data.name: Global DevOps Summit
data.description: You will meet with a diverse community of like-minded software practitioners and top-level technical decision-makers, who want to experience the latest technologies, pick up actionable tips and best practices, connect with technical experts, and understand strategies to hire and grow great engineeri…

relatedRecords.name: DevOpsDays India 2019 at Bengaluru
relatedRecords.description: Devopsdays India is a global event complementing other Devopsdays events across the world. You can find more about Devopsdays global event here.

relatedRecords.name: Rootconf
relatedRecords.description: Rootconf is India’s most well-known conference on DevOps and IT infrastructure. Rootconf attracts systems and operations engineers, and decision-makers in IT to share real world knowledge about building reliable systems.

relatedRecords.name: DevFest Ranchi 2019
relatedRecords.description: DevFests are large, community-run developer events happening around the globe focused on community building and learning about Google’s technologies. Hosted by GDG Ranchi, DevFest Ranchi will cover multiple product areas such as Android, Google Assistant, Firebase / Identity, Google Cloud Platform, …

relatedRecords.name: Software Freedom Day - 2k19
relatedRecords.description: Software Freedom Day 2017 is approaching, let’s tell people about it! Software Freedom Day (aka SFD) is a yearly event organised all around the world by open source enthusiasts.
